entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EFCore 7.0 Question - Can IQueryExpressionInterceptor actually use scoped data? #29573
  • Json: predicate on json bool property generates incorrect sql #29572
    8.0.0
  • EFCore 7.0 Bug - Invalid Operation Exception RE "Temporary Value" #29570
  • EF 7 Navigation propeties fixup #29568
  • Compiler warning about System.Text.Json after upgrading to EfCore 7 #29567
  • [EF6 + OData] Calculate total count: Nullable object must have a value exception #29566
  • EFCore 7 - SqlServer - Git test TPTTableSplittingSqlServerTest.Can_query_shared is generating different foreign key constraint when compared to EFCore 6 #29564
  • Invalid configuration when scaffolding a manytomany table with underscore in fieldname #29563
  • Batched query breaks after upgrade to 7.0 - The UPDATE statement conflicted with the FOREIGN KEY constraint #29562
  • Lazy building of internal runtime model #29561

Closed

  • Adding an existing item to a many-to-many relationship with a custom join entity does not get fixed up by the change tracker #29554
  • Crash while scaffolding in EF7 when no primary key set on ManyToMany table #29569
  • [EF7] Method not found: ... Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Conventions.ConventionSet.get_ModelFinalizingConventions() #29557
  • EF generates additional mapping to the same sql column with '1' postfix in column name #29503
  • ManyToMany not working if the joint entity is explicitly set #29493
  • ... #29481
  • ("Hello, World!") #29480
  • Parallel requests in asp core with EF core produce FOREIGN KEY constraint conflict #29387
  • SqlNullabilityProcessor throwing NullReferenceException on one server in cluster #29340
  • Sqlite: Invalid SQL for reused alias? #27129
  • EF Core Interceptors not working with async commit #29560

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Use simpler Docker tags #29575
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Fix to #29572 - Json: predicate on json bool property generates incorrect sql #29574
    auto-merge
  • Make DbUpdateException.Entries empty when we can't populate it #29571
  • Fix SQL Server result mapping for bulk insert #29565

Merged

  • Add test for ExecuteUpdate with two inner joins #29522
    auto-merge

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Use simpler Docker tags #29576
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/2.1] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.2 #29433
